pkgmetadata.longdescription: JLC Order Assistant: This app provides convenience for you to place an order, and quickly obtain discounts and order information, without waiting for review on the website! Place an order in the order assistant and enjoy a discount immediately!
嘉立创下单助手:该应用为您下单提供便利，快速获取优惠及下单信息， 无需在网站等待审核审单！在下单助手下单立享打折优惠！
